name: Pretty Joy
wishText: May I live to always be with you! ;)
text1: You are the love that came without warning
textInChatBox: And I can't stop thinking about you
text2: You are the first person I think of and the last person I think of before I sleep
text3: Its like all day and all night you are the one am constantly thinking about
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I miss every minute I'm not with you
replayText: You mean so much to me so don't think am ever going away not today, not tommorrow not ever
